scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross in the center. To the left, the Virgin Mary, supported by another woman, mourns. To the right, a group of figures, including a man in a green and blue robe and a soldier in armor, observe the event. In the background, a walled city with towers and spires is visible, set against a hilly landscape. The overall impression is one of solemnity and religious devotion.
